aircraft.value: Falcon Prime - AC-7495-922 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Battery thermal runaway indication. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 19/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 20/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 23/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 24/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 25/08/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
